type.description: One of the{@code ColorSpace} type constants.

numComponents.description: The number of components in the color space.

pData.description: Placeholder for data for native functions

pixel_bits.description: The total number of bits in the pixel.

transferType.description: Data type of the array used to represent pixel values.

width.description:
Width in pixels of the region of image data that this SampleModel
 describes.

height.description:
Height in pixels of the region of image data that this SampleModel
 describes.

numBands.description: Number of bands of the image data that this SampleModel describes.

dataType.description: Data type of the DataBuffer storing the pixel data.

theTracker.description: package private for easy access from tracker

dataType.description: The data type of this DataBuffer.

banks.description: The number of banks in this DataBuffer.

offset.description: Offset into default (first) bank from which to get the first element.

sampleModel.description:
The SampleModel that describes how pixels from this Raster
are stored in the DataBuffer.

dataBuffer.description: The DataBuffer that stores the image data.

minX.description: The X coordinate of the upper-left pixel of this Raster.

minY.description: The Y coordinate of the upper-left pixel of this Raster.

sampleModelTranslateX.description:
The X translation from the coordinate space of the
Raster's SampleModel to that of the Raster.

sampleModelTranslateY.description:
The Y translation from the coordinate space of the
Raster's SampleModel to that of the Raster.

numBands.description: The number of bands in the Raster.

numDataElements.description: The number of DataBuffer data elements per pixel.

parent.description: The parent of this Raster, or null.

sampleModel.description:
The SampleModel that describes how pixels from this Raster
are stored in the DataBuffer.

dataBuffer.description: The DataBuffer that stores the image data.

minX.description: The X coordinate of the upper-left pixel of this Raster.

minY.description: The Y coordinate of the upper-left pixel of this Raster.

sampleModelTranslateX.description:
The X translation from the coordinate space of the
Raster's SampleModel to that of the Raster.

sampleModelTranslateY.description:
The Y translation from the coordinate space of the
Raster's SampleModel to that of the Raster.

numBands.description: The number of bands in the Raster.

numDataElements.description: The number of DataBuffer data elements per pixel.

parent.description: The parent of this Raster, or null.

accelerationPriority.description:
Priority for accelerating this image.  Subclasses are free to
set different default priorities and applications are free to
set the priority for specific images via the
{@code setAccelerationPriority(float)} method.

theConsumer.description: We can only have one consumer since we immediately return the data...
